Name: Gryffindor
Description: Gryffindor values bravery and courage. Their house colors are scarlet and gold, and their house emblem is a lion.

Name: Ravenclaw
Description: Ravenclaw values intelligence and wit. Their house colors are blue and bronze, and their house emblem is an eagle.

Name: Hufflepuff
Description: Hufflepuff values hard work and loyalty. Their house colors are yellow and black, and their house emblem is a badger.

Name: Slytherin
Description: Slytherin values cunningness and ambition. Their house colors are green and silver, and their house emblem is a serpent.

Name: Not Affiliated
Description: Used as a non-Affliation for those who weren't part of a house
